title: Drawing, "Echo Lake, New Hampshire", 1875–80
medium: Charcoal, black and white chalk on gray laid paper.
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed in black chalk on label: F. Hopkinson Smith
provenance: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith
creditline: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith
description: Horizontal view of Echo Lake in the foreground and trees on far right, with clouds and mists over the mountains in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Echo Lake, New Hampshire", 1875–80.
1875–80. Charcoal, black and white chalk on gray laid paper.. Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith. 1923-41-8.
